title: Software Engineer
description: Building end to end JEE application for healthcare sector using technologies like IBM Porlet, EJB, XML, XSLT, DB2 WAS, WPS, WADS, MQseris, Ant, Checkstyle, Rational XDE, Unit, XML Spy. Taking lead on describing how to do TDD based development. Developing POC & creating report on performance comparison of XML/XSLT Vs JSF based page rendering. Collaborating with architects to come up with the best architecture for the proposed requirement
